attributes.action: make all traffic policemen wear clown suits whilst on duty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As it is widely accecpted that traffic policing in the United Kingdom is a joke being solely focused on revenue gathering and not public safety, we propose that all traffic policemen wear clown suits whilst on duty. This way the general public will be constantly reminded how daft the current state of road policing is.
